title: Meeting Notes - Product Strategy
content: Discussed Q1 product roadmap. Key priorities: user authentication improvements, mobile app optimization, and new dashboard features. Next steps: create detailed specs by Friday.

title: Ideas for User Onboarding
content:
1. Interactive tutorial for new users
2. Progressive disclosure of features
3. Personalized welcome flow
4. Help tooltips on key actions
5. Video tutorials for complex features

title: Technical Debt Items
content:
• Refactor authentication service
• Update deprecated dependencies
• Improve error handling in API calls
• Add unit tests for utility functions
• Optimize database queries

title: Customer Feedback Summary
content:
Recent feedback highlights:
- Users want better mobile experience
- Dashboard loading time needs improvement
- Request for dark mode theme
- More customization options needed
- Integration with popular tools
